ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron you say, I am impressed. he said. he wished he could say what was truly on his mind, Great I m serving a megalomaniac with dilusions of grandeur

"Megatron you say, I am impressed." he said. he wished he could say 
what was truly on his mind, "Great I'm serving a megalomaniac with 
dilusions of grandeur and a superiority complex the size of a small 
moon.

He knew that sooner or later he'd run into one of the councils 
lackeys, but for now all he had to do was put on a good show.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked at him.
> "You will be serving Megatron." as she walked towards the base.
> She opened her link,"Hey, I got a bot to join us.  We have a new 
> member on our team."
> 
> She was happy that this newcomer was buying all this.
> She wasn't as greedy or as dumb as she led on.  She knew an 
> overdressed lazar when she saw one. But what she couldn't see was 
> what was this bot up to.  So she would play along untill she found 
> out.  But what she really wanted was that ship.  It could take her 
to 
> Cybertron.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobias latest ploy worked, he truly was one who could sell ice 
to 
> > eskimos.
> > 
> > "Lead the way my feral friend." Phobia followed with both hands 
on 
> > the weapon just in case the predacon got any dumb ideas. "So who 
is 
> > it that I will be serving?"
> >
